rdf:Description.dc:title: Guide to services for lower-income Albertans 2004
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Human Resources and Employment.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Human Resources and Employment,
rdf:Description.dc:description: The Government of Alberta has many programs to help lower income Albertans. This guide can help find out what's available.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Poor
Poverty
